meta.og_title: Udio AI Ultimate Parameter & Meta-Tag Cheatsheet
meta.og_description: Complete reference for Udio AI music generation with parameters, tags, and examples

content.intro_text: A comprehensive reference guide for Udio AI music generation parameters, meta-tags, and best practices. Use this cheatsheet to improve your prompts and get better results.
content.parameters_intro: These technical parameters control various aspects of generation. Adjust them to fine-tune your results.
content.tags_intro: Structure and meta tags help organize your prompts and influence the generation process.
content.examples_intro: Study these example prompts to better understand how to effectively use parameters and tags together.
content.best_practices_intro: Follow these guidelines to get the best results from Udio AI.
content.about_text: This cheatsheet is maintained by the community to help users get the most out of Udio AI. Feel free to contribute by submitting improvements or corrections.
